# AI Coding Guidelines for programacion_casa

## Project Overview

This is a Python learning repository with exercises organized by units (UD1-UD4), covering basics to advanced topics like OOP and list comprehensions. Code is educational, focusing on clear, simple implementations.

## Language & Style

- **Language**: Python 3.x
- **Paradigm**: Procedural with functions; OOP introduced in UD4
- **Execution**: Run scripts directly with `python filename.py`

## Naming Conventions

- **Variables/Functions**: Mix of Spanish (domain-specific like `generos`, `base_datos_dados`) and English (general like `numero_caras`, `contador`)
- **Consistency**: Match surrounding code's language choice

## User Interaction Patterns

- **Input Prompts**: Use Spanish text, e.g., `input("Indique el nombre de la pelicula\n")`
- **Output Messages**: Spanish for user-facing text, e.g., `print("Te has salido del programa")`
- **Formatting**: Include newlines (`\n`) in prompts for readability

## Code Structure Examples

- **Simple Scripts**: Direct execution, e.g., [UD1/Activitats 1-7/Actividad1.py](UD1/Activitats 1-7/Actividad1.py)
- **Menu-Driven Apps**: While loop with enumerated options, e.g., [UD2/Casino/scriptcasino.py](UD2/Casino/scriptcasino.py)
- **Data Storage**: Dicts for databases, lists for options/genres, e.g., [UD2/videoclub/videoclub.py](UD2/videoclub/videoclub.py)
- **List Comprehensions**: For data generation, e.g., [UD3/1-10 listas comprimidas/ejercicio1.py](UD3/1-10 listas comprimidas/ejercicio1.py)

## Common Patterns

- **Functions**: Define operations separately, call in main logic
- **Data Structures**: Built-in only (lists, dicts, sets)
- **Imports**: Standard library (e.g., `import random`)
- **Error Handling**: Minimal; focus on functionality over robustness
- **Output**: Print results directly; use f-strings for formatting

## Workflow

- **Running Code**: `python path/to/file.py`
- **No Dependencies**: Pure Python, no external packages
- **No Tests/Build**: Direct script execution
- **ZIP Folders**: For exercise submissions/backups

## Key Reference Files

- [UD2/videoclub/videoclub.py](UD2/videoclub/videoclub.py): Menu system with dict database
- [UD2/Casino/scriptcasino.py](UD2/Casino/scriptcasino.py): Stats and random operations
- [UD4/Actividad (11-13)/actividad12.py](UD4/Actividad (11-13)/actividad12.py): OOP example (note: may have bugs to fix)</content>
